page.title: 09FARMING. An Estate farm.
page.content: The farm is 550 acres.It is in two parts and it is an arable stock farm. They grow barley for the cattle feed ,sell some for beer and whisky and save some for seed.They grow potatoes called Record and they are very good for making chips and crisps.The farmer grows yellow flowered oil seed rape. The pods are green in Spring,then they go brown and black.The combine crushes small seeds to make margarine and cooking oil.The chickens are Warren Leghorns.They buy them when they are ten weeks old.They lay eggs when they are 21 weeks old.120 hens lay 750 eggs a week.They are free range so they can roam about.A lot of the eggs are double yolked and they are big and heavy.The farmer grows vegetables like peas for cattle feed,cabbages,carrots and leeks.They have got a farm shop. (Jane Andrews Age 7)
